Class Notation

java.lang.Object
Notation
public class Notation
extends java.lang.Object
The Notation Class - utility class will introduce some methods of infixToPostfix to convert infix notation to postfix notation that will take in a string and return a string, a method postfixToInfix to convert postfix notation to infix notation that will take in a string and return a string, and a method to evaluatePostfix to evaluate the postfix expression. It will take in a string and return a double.
Author:
Herman Mann

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description

    The Notation Utility class's default constructor.

    The method of theOperand will take in operands of two different numbers as string representations, and also an individual character of each of the string's character representation(s) one by one.

  • Method Details

    • theOperand

      public static java.lang.String theOperand​(java.lang.String firstNum, java.lang.String secondNum, char individualCharacter) throws InvalidNotationFormatException
      The method of theOperand will take in operands of two different numbers as string representations, and also an individual character of each of the string's character representation(s) one by one.
      Parameters:
      firstNum - - the first number to get the operand of.
      secondNum - - the second number to get the operand of.
      individualCharacter - - each individual character from left to right in the first or second number as first introduced as String representation will add the resulting character one by one.
      Returns:
      - the String represented result of the numbers operanded result, depending on the operator of action.
      Throws:
      InvalidNotationFormatException - - if the String represented result of the operand being added is invalid.

    • evaluatePostfixExpression

      public static double evaluatePostfixExpression​(java.lang.String postfixExpr) throws InvalidNotationFormatException
      Evaluates a postfix expression from a string to a double.
      Parameters:
      postfixExpr - - the postfix expression in String format.
      Returns:
      - the evaluation of the postfix expression as a double.
      Throws:
      InvalidNotationFormatException - - if the postfix expression format is invalid.

    • evaluateInfixExpression

      public static double evaluateInfixExpression​(java.lang.String infixExpr) throws InvalidNotationFormatException
      Evaluates a infix expression from a string to a double.
      Parameters:
      infixExpr - - the infix expression in String format.
      Returns:
      - the evaluation of the infix expression as a double.
      Throws:
      InvalidNotationFormatException - - if the infix expression format is invalid.

    • convertPostfixToInfix

      public static java.lang.String convertPostfixToInfix​(java.lang.String postfix) throws InvalidNotationFormatException
      Convert the Postfix expression to the Infix expression.
      Parameters:
      postfix - - the postfix expression in string format.
      Returns:
      - the infix expression in string format.
      Throws:
      InvalidNotationFormatException - - if the postfix expression format is invalid.

    • convertInfixToPostfix

      public static java.lang.String convertInfixToPostfix​(java.lang.String infix) throws InvalidNotationFormatException
      Convert an infix expression into a postfix expression.
      Parameters:
      infix - - the infix expression in string format.
      Returns:
      - the postfix expression in string format.
      Throws:
      InvalidNotationFormatException - - if the infix expression format is invalid.
